{"id":1477540607,"question_id":2695,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1734066912,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"242 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1477540607/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Score of an Array After Marking All Elements","memory":"140.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long findScore(vector<int>& nums) {\n        long long score = 0;\n        set<pair<int,int>> st;\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.size(); i++)\n            st.insert({nums[i], i});\n        for(auto s:st) {\n            if(nums[s.second] == -1) //marked.\n                continue;\n                score += s.first;\n                nums[s.second] = -1;\n                if(s.second-1>=0)\n                    nums[s.second-1] = -1;\n                if(s.second+1<nums.size())\n                    nums[s.second+1] = -1;\n        }\n        return score;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-score-of-an-array-after-marking-all-elements","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
